title: RCE, SQLi, IDOR, Auth Bypass and XSS at [staff.███.edu.eg ]

summaries.content:
Hello Penetration Testers! 

- on  6 march i was surfing my University website for education purposes..
- i decided to check if my data  safe on the website or not ! 
*So let's start it !*

I got all the subdomains in few minutes, then i saw a juicy name :"D  staff.███.edu.eg 
immediately i opened it on my browser :3 

##" SQL Injection "##

* i found a cool "login" page   and "search staff" page 
* i decided to test the search function  ..  i entered   single quote   '    only :3   !  
{F342020}

 I was like ...
{F342031}
it was so fast and i started to dig more and more ..
until i had bypassed the WAF  with @k3r1it0  "he covered my back <3  SQLi Elite Man"
then we extracted the Database ! 
including our sensitive data and other students and other doctors and our marks ! :3 



##" Authorization Bypass! "##

*  i found another juicy issue ! 
* i noticed that all admins users like
"faculty name - number"    e.g   " cs-1234"   :"DDD 
and i found that there's a default password for all accounts   " The Hardest Password Ever"  = 123456   
{F342030}

Finally! Logged in as administrator.. so let's check what you have in your fridge, Doctors!! :"D
{F342032}


##"Insecure Direct Object References"##

* First, i found a juicy request :"D  like
GET //al█-3█ HTTP/1.1

* when i tried to change the number :"D WTF it's worked  and i opened another admin account without Authentication  

Admin 1:
{F342024}

Admin 2:
{F342023}



##" Remote Code Execution"##


* Then, I found my favorite endpoint ever!  " Upload Your Photo"  
*  Frst i tried to upload my lazer :"D   and succeeded.
{F342022}
* after that..i must try to upload php file so i tried and the result was "03-09-2018-1707133159.octet-stream" and not running my code ! 
{F342027}

* so after few digging  i asked @x-vector for help  and he noticed that  i didn't notice :"D  the content type was
 "application/octet-stream" so i changed it to "application/php"  just it 
and done security bypassed :3 ! 
{F342028}



##"Cross Site Scripting"##

* at the end i was surfing another search function and entered simple payload and found XSS yaay! :3 
{F342021}

it was a Powerful day! 
* i reported the manager what did i found and how to fix it.. and he thanked me and gave me a notebook and a pencil as a swag  :3 
{F342029}
* they took the website down until they fixed all the bugs  within 2 months 

* I hope you enjoyed reading my report (: 

Best,
@GeneralEG
summaries.content_html:
Hello Penetration Testers!

  • on 6 march i was surfing my University website for education purposes..
  • i decided to check if my data safe on the website or not ! So let's start it !

I got all the subdomains in few minutes, then i saw a juicy name :"D staff.███.edu.eg
immediately i opened it on my browser :3

" SQL Injection "

  • i found a cool "login" page and "search staff" page
  • i decided to test the search function .. i entered single quote ' only :3 !

I was like ...

it was so fast and i started to dig more and more ..
until i had bypassed the WAF with @k3r1it0 "he covered my back <3 SQLi Elite Man"
then we extracted the Database !
including our sensitive data and other students and other doctors and our marks ! :3

" Authorization Bypass! "

  • i found another juicy issue !
  • i noticed that all admins users like "faculty name - number" e.g " cs-1234" :"DDD and i found that there's a default password for all accounts " The Hardest Password Ever" = 123456

Finally! Logged in as administrator.. so let's check what you have in your fridge, Doctors!! :"D

"Insecure Direct Object References"

  • First, i found a juicy request :"D like
    GET //al█-3█ HTTP/1.1

  • when i tried to change the number :"D WTF it's worked and i opened another admin account without Authentication

Admin 1:

Admin 2:

" Remote Code Execution"

  • Then, I found my favorite endpoint ever! " Upload Your Photo"
  • Frst i tried to upload my lazer :"D and succeeded.

  • after that..i must try to upload php file so i tried and the result was "03-09-2018-1707133159.octet-stream" and not running my code !

  • so after few digging i asked @x-vector for help and he noticed that i didn't notice :"D the content type was
    "application/octet-stream" so i changed it to "application/php" just it
    and done security bypassed :3 !

"Cross Site Scripting"

  • at the end i was surfing another search function and entered simple payload and found XSS yaay! :3

it was a Powerful day!

  • i reported the manager what did i found and how to fix it.. and he thanked me and gave me a notebook and a pencil as a swag :3

  • they took the website down until they fixed all the bugs within 2 months

  • I hope you enjoyed reading my report (:

Best,
@GeneralEG
